thread.title: BRIEF-CTI Biopharma pockets $15.7 mln from direct share offer
thread.title_full: BRIEF-CTI Biopharma pockets $15.7 mln from direct share offer | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-CTI Biopharma pockets $15.7 mln from direct share offer
text: Sept 30 CTI Biopharma says: * Has closed sale of 10 million shares to institutional investors in a registered direct offering * Gross proceeds from the offering around $15.7 million * Group plans to use net proceeds to support development of lead product candidate Pacritinib Source text for Eikon: (Reporting by Milan newsroom)
